feature.label: The Rascal MetaProgramming Language
feature.description: Rascal is a domain specific language for metaprogramming, which includes source code analysis source-to-source transformation, reverse engineering, source code generation and source code visualization.
feature.copyright:
Copyright NWO-I - CWI 2008-2018 Please note that this feature bundle also contains the following third-party libraries:
* ASM byte code library * org.jdom * apache math * apache commons * jline * snakeyml * lucene * nanohttpd * icu4j * vallang * Eclipse JDT
